src.data.data_readers.clean_column_names(ls_col_names: list, chars_to_remove: list | None = None) → list[source]

utility function to clean column names

Parameters:

  • ls_col_names – list of strings to modify

  • chars_to_remove – default: [’.’, ‘ ‘, ‘-’] replaced with _

Returns:

list of strings, modified
